name: Resident Evil:GB
description:
Resident Evil for the Gameboy? 

Enter the world of portable survival horror.

This is a large vertical slice demake for a GAMEBOY port of Resident Evil's Jill Valentine campaign. Explore the Spencer Mansion in a feature complete gameplay experience as you try to survive the horrors within.

Available in both Webbrowser and ROM formats, Yes this is an actual working GAMEBOY game.

Made with GBstudio

BUGS MAY EXIST.
